name: Chaos Commute
description:
A game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. The theme was "Out Of Control" and the game was made over the course of 48 hours.

How to Play
  • Use the arrow keys, AD or your gamepad to control your car
  • Use Spacebar or A (XBox) to jump
Team
  • Thomas Stadler - Game and Level Design
  • Sebastian Uitz (https://firetotemgames.com/) - Programming
  • Philipp Auer - Programming
  • Veit Isopp - Special Effects
  • Manuel Santner (https://polylabs.org/)- 3D Graphics
  • Alessandro Chiovoloni - 2D Graphics
  • Michael Steinkellner (https://www.merlinnsound.com/) - Music and Sound Effects
Changes
  • v1.0 - 12.07.2020 - first version
